Like authoritarian questionnaire ask various chatbots questions and categorize them by their responses, especially those with api. Build chatbot taxonomy or lexonomy or personality profile.

- Rate them on Loebner scale using Cole's adversarial nn bot?
- personality profile questions (Briggs, Jung)
- Vandy authoritarian paper questions
- theory of mind
- Facebook pronoun reference questions
- English comprehension test questions
- factual questions that should quote wikipedia
  - how many planets are there?
  -  Capital of Alaska?
  - Capital of France?
  - where is Paris?
- IQ analogy questions
- common sense questions that a computer should understand,  electrical power, internet bandwidth, web page error messages
- body questions, leg bone connected to the ? bone

- like coursera start with bit vector model
